author: Patrick Cc:
description:
EA Skate's original promise was to be a reflection of real skateboarding culture. And their first 3 games did a great job at doing that. After 15 years of waiting for the 4th version of the game.. we realize they have abandoned their roots. Nno story mode, no professional skaters, no SKATE mode, no custom parks, no real skate culture, no offline play, and no soul. Instead, it offers fortnite-esque visuals, forced online multiplayer, and overpriced microtransactions.

title: The Death of My Favorite Video Game Series (Skate 4)
